The use of terms such as: voluntary compliance" by the Internal Revenue Service to describe the federal income tax system.
The principle of sub: silentio or "silence condones consent" used by the IRS to enforce taxes.
The claim that the IRS frightens citizen: while privately admitting it is a "voluntary" tax.
The misinterpretation of the term: voluntary" by tax protesters, as it refers to the behavior of the taxpayer, not the tax itself.
